text: Asset Marketplace April Rollup (for providers) - Theme updates required by May 30th, 2023 Asset Marketplace April Rollup (for providers) - Theme updates required by May 30th, 2023 We've just published our *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/asset-marketplace-april-rollup-theme-updates-required-by-may-30th-2023|April 2023 Asset Marketplace Rollup>*. This update requires providers to update their themes by May 30th. Updates are related to the upcoming Module Categories release, updated requirements and validation, and future compatibility with new modules. :rolled_up_newspaper: View on Changelog button :mega: Discuss on Community Forum button
